entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-03-16
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • XslCompiledTransform is calling sync Flush #66735
  • Stopwatch is inconsistent when guarding against negative Elapsed durations #66734
  • sqlpackage AdditionalDeploymentContributor dll .net 6.0 #66732
  • System.Text.Json ReferenceHandler test failures when enabling async in tests #66727
    7.0.0
  • Blazor Wasm Native Build tests are failing #66725
  • Package versioning vs framework versioning #66722
    Future
  • [wasm] Regression on windows/AOT - `mono-aot-cross.exe` crashes every time #66718
    7.0.0
  • [NativeAOT] Metadata not trimmed for nested Interface types when compiling TerraFx.Interop.Windows #66716
    7.0.0
  • JIT: Incorrect optimization of x & -x on x86 #66709
    7.0.0
  • NullabilityInfo returns incorrect state for non nullable reference type in nested generics #66708
  • Unhandled exception causes docker container to hang on ARM64 #66707
  • SslStream.KeyExchangeStrength is zero on non-Windows platforms #66705
  • HtmlEncoder manual configuration does not work for some symbols. #66728
  • GC crash in background_sweep() and other methods #66699
    Future
  • The Parallel.ForEachAsync propagates OperationCanceledException of unknown origin #66695
  • CryptoStreamTests ReadAsync_CancelPendingTask_ThrowsCancellationException long running test on Ubuntu #66694
  • Test failure System.Net.Http.Functional.Tests.HttpClientTest.GetContentAsync_WhenCanNotConnect_ExceptionContainsHostInfo #66692
  • Test failure JIT/Regression/JitBlue/Runtime_40444/Runtime_40444/Runtime_40444.sh #66690
    7.0.0
  • Test failure JIT\\HardwareIntrinsics\\X86\\Lzcnt\\Lzcnt_ro\\Lzcnt_ro.cmd #66689
  • Error in Int16 variables when running in M1 macs #66720

Closed

  • Add an EventSource to the certificate stack #40445
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: DrawRectangle should accept RectangleF as one of the overloads #62401
    7.0.0
  • Revisit PatternContext<TFrame>.PushDataFrame nullable annotation #65590
    7.0.0
  • Corefx internal PRs should use non '.Open' queues #65741
  • IMemoryCache.Dispose should call Dispose on cached value if it implements IDisposable 2 #66724
  • Proposal: Inject existing object into MEF2 #29400
    7.0.0
  • NamedPipeClientStream sometimes throws FileNotFoundException #65434
    7.0.0
  • [dotnet-sdk-7.0.100-preview.3.22161.14] Regex.Match method return unexcepted Groups elements #66697
    7.0.0
  • Test failure file_io.GetSystemTime.test1 #66630
  • [Wasm][AOT] Methods containing a try/catch block are 30x slower because of the interpreter #56309
    7.0.0
  • Webassembly performance problems in aot+interp mode #60247
    7.0.0
  • Connection Abstractions #1793
    Future
  • Add UTF8 to CharSet #17000
    Future
  • Add StringContent ctor providing tighter control over charset #17036
    Future
  • [WebToolsE2E] Running console app 7.0 with the code "Console.ReadKey();" in Program.cs, an extra "13" appears in the command prompt. #66596
    7.0.0
  • [DllImportGenerator] Update `GeneratedDllImportAttribute` handling of character set / encoding #61326
    7.0.0
  • sigsegv crash on macos net50 aspnetcore #61702
    5.0.x
  • System.Text.Json.JsonSerializerOptions.GetJsonTypeInfoFromContextOrCreate(Type) assert causing test failures #66672
  • [mono] Failing test System.Text.Json.Serialization.Tests.InvalidTypeTests_Writer.DeserializeInvalidType #66240
  • System.Text.Json tests fail around DST time change #66555
    7.0.0
  • JsonNode does not respect PropertyNamingPolicy #66661
  • HttpClient fails to initialize SSL. #64492
    7.0.0
  • SslCertificateTrust is not sent on Windows #65515
    7.0.0
  • SslStream tests can hit Assert and fail completely #65455
    7.0.0
  • False positive for CA1416 in net6 library #64395
  • LibraryImportAttribute for p/invoke source generation #46822
    7.0.0
  • Test failure GC\\Scenarios\\ServerModel\\servermodel\\servermodel.cmd #63908
  • Optimize AdvSimd.Extract() when passed variable that can be const propagated #36070
    Future
  • Test failure JIT/jit64/hfa/main/testE/hfa_nd2E_d/hfa_nd2E_d.sh #60821
    7.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • changing CPU from int to double #66743
  • [PERF][TEST] Enable use MONO_ENV_OPTIONS="--llvm" on perf runs. #66742
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Use ROS<byte> instead of byte[] where it makes sense on S.S.C.Cose #66741
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • [mono] Fix static virtual calls to generic methods from gshared code #66739
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Add flags checks to BMI1 intrinsic lowering #66736
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [mono] Move basic w32file* and w32process* functions to eventpipe #66731
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • [mono] Merge icall-def-netcore.h back into icall-def.h #66730
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Consolidate sync/async JsonSerializer test abstractions #66729
    area-System.Text.Json, test-enhancement, 7.0.0
  • Port Access violation occurring in System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ForestTrustRelationshipInformation fix from .netfx to .net-core #66726
    area-System.DirectoryServices, community-contribution
  • Change ConfigurationBinder to avoid reading properties unnecessarily. #66723
    area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution
  • Proposed changes to ECMA 335 for checked user-defined operators #66714
    area-Meta
  • Eat cancellation exceptions from WaitAsync in Parallel.ForEachAsync #66712
    area-System.Threading.Tasks, 7.0.0
  • WIP: [Mono] Fix warnings to enable W4 on Windows. #66710
    os-windows, area-Build-mono
  • Run illink before ApiCompat #66706
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, linkable-framework
  • Initial refactoring before fixing evaluation of methods on primitives. #66704
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Fix summary doc, the client name is an argument. #66703
    area-Extensions-HttpClientFactory, community-contribution
  • Use values from TlsCipherSuiteData for SslConnectionInfo on Windows #66702
    area-System.Net.Security
  • Avoid allocating a delegate in OptionsMonitor.Get() when possible. #66688
    area-Extensions-Options, community-contribution

Merged

  • Add tracing to the Linux X509Chain implementation #65860
    area-System.Security
  • Fix automatic adding to all projects for issue boards as well. #66740
    area-Meta
  • Revisit `PatternContext<TFrame>.PushDataFrame` nullable annotation #65598
    breaking-change, new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-FileSystem, community-contribution
  • [Group 3] Enable nullable annotations for `Microsoft.Extensions.Hosting.Abstractions` #65403
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Hosting, community-contribution
  • Update Roslyn Testing SDK #66681
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • Inject existing object into MEF2 #66364
    area-System.Composition, community-contribution
  • Moving "Generic Math" in box and making it no longer experimental #65731
    area-System.Numerics, breaking-change, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Improve NamedPipeClientStream.Connect edge cases handling #65553
    area-System.IO, 7.0.0
  • Only move PRs to Done column on projects that already contain the PR when they are moved to a different area. #66737
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Fix beginning fixups of captures after Regex span support #66713
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • fix pal test #66636
    area-PAL-coreclr
  • Fix incorrect conversion from int to size_t triggered by PR 66552. #66721
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Fix mono warnings on linux arm64 #65256
    area-Build-mono, community-contribution
  • Dedup SymbolicRegexMatcher construction #66617
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, 7.0.0
  • need to clear mark array bits for regions completely outside the marked range in FGCs #66696
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Update fabricbot config for Libraries area pods. Scripts moved to dotnet/fabricbot-config repo. #66691
    area-Meta, 7.0.0
  • Console.ReadKey should print a char, not an integer #66609
    area-System.Console, 7.0.0
  • [PERF][MAUI] Close missing tag in proj file #66717
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Fix System.Text.Json tests affected by DST #66559
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution
  • Disable Xharness telemetry for wasm #66698
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Fix outerloop NonBacktracking test throwing argument exception #66693
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, 7.0.0
  • [mono] Optimize and clean-up `System.Reflection.Emit.ILGenerator`. #65251
    area-System.Reflection-mono, community-contribution
  • Enable some ARM32 tests #66553
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Condition Windows SslCertificateTrust test on Registry value #65848
    area-System.Net.Security
  • Await pending client authentication task before disposing #66682
    area-System.Net.Security
  • Address a few TODOs on S.S.C.Cose. #66641
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • Expose `LibraryImportAttribute` #66434
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0

Updated

  • Workaround NuGet error in Content_Types #66744
    area-Serialization
  • Add metrics for caching #66479
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Caching
  • [Group 3] Enable nullable annotations for `Microsoft.Extensions.Logging` #65262
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Logging, community-contribution
  • [draft] hot reload WIP #66455
    NO-MERGE, area-EnC-mono
  • [LoongArch64] coreclr-jit directory #62843
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64, 7.0.0
  • [wasm][debugger] Debug on firefox #61776
    area-Debugger-mono
  • Remove test coverage of FeatureSIMD=0 #66670
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Implement NativeLibrary.GetEntryPointModuleHandle #57610
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • Reimplement stubs to improve performance #65738
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Add the CustomTypeMarshallerAttribute type to make it easier to identify marshaller types #65591
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 7.0.0
  • Upgrading the version of Package Validation used in the repo to reduce Build flakiness when loading Roslyn #66635
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [IGNORE][wasm] debugging aot on CI #66685
    arch-wasm
  • Implement missing SymUnmanaged* interfaces #66650
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [release/6.0] Add missing Oracle RIDs #66684
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Add xarch `blsmsk` #66561
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Emscripten 3.1.1 bump #63894
    area-Build-mono
  • Fix #41618 Correct marshalling of SortKey objects on Linux #65548
    area-System.DirectoryServices, community-contribution
  • Linux-bionic (Android libc w/o Android interop) initial implementation #66147
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [mono][jit] Pass generic context when ldftn of generic method #66350
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Only use first field maps for shared statics #66558
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix too narrow loads while unspilling #66675
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Do not reorder HTTP header values #65249
    area-System.Net.Http, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Remove dotnet6 feeds #66447
    area-Infrastructure
  • Publish crossgen as AOT if supported by the target platform #65948
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • [API Implementation]: DirectoryInfo.CopyTo / Directory.Copy #62375
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Always append the "dll" extension for native libraries loads on Windows #66666
    area-Interop-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Structs: Do not mark "Hidden buffer pointer" as address-exposed #64130
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add additional trace to HttpConnectionPool #66605
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Reenable CA 4701 #66676
    area-Infrastructure, 7.0.0
  • Rely on PGO for isinst/castclass #65922
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • ARM64 - Optimizing a % b operations part 2 #66407
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Use SubtleCrypto API on browser DOM scenarios #65966
    area-System.Security, 7.0.0
  • Load C++/CLI DLLs built against .NET 7.0+ in default ALC #66486
    area-Host
  • Implement DivRem intrinsic for X86 #66551
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Introduce write barriers in wasm bindings, migrate to ref/out params, add gc safe regions #65994
    NO-MERGE, arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript
  • [WIP] Refactoring and perf of reflection Invoke #66357
    NO-REVIEW, area-System.Reflection, 7.0.0
  • Remove the Unix code from `System.Drawing.Common`. #64623
    area-System.Drawing, community-contribution
  • [wasm] try this with icu updated #66528
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Methods on primitives 65707 #66654
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono, needs-author-action
  • Improves handling of env prefixes containing __ #65757
    breaking-change, area-Extensions-Configuration, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, community-contribution
  • Remove condition that forbids promotion of HFAs with CUSTOMLAYOUT flag #64863
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • ARM64 - Emitting `msub` instruction #66621
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-03-16
entry.content:
Issues

Created

PullRequests

Created

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-03-16
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Merge installer repo into SDK #24415
    Backlog
  • dotnet publish -graph fails while dotnet build -graph works #24414

Closed

  • dotnet sdk problem with running Azure Function project in Mac M1 in Rider #24215
  • workload update issue 6.0.300-preview.22154.4 #24409

PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.2xx' => 'release/6.0.3xx' #24416
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Port the prep machine change and the helix update to VS 2022 #24412
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Fix unstable test #24410
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 1667278 #24395
    Area-Infrastructure

Merged

  • Port the helix update to VS 2022 #24411
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [dotnet-watch] Skip dotnet watch flaky test 602xx #24407

Updated

  • Update the hardcoded net5.0 to the current framework #23881
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.1xx' => 'release/6.0.2xx' #24302
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Properly handle empty solution and project paths in SDK resolver #24333
    Area-SdkResolvers

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-03-16
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Find All References doesn't find usages of checked user-defined operators #60216
  • Completion list for explicit interface implementation doesn't include `checked` keyword for checked user-defined operators #60215
  • Implement interface fixer doesn't spit out `checked` keyword for checked user-defined operators #60214
  • Typo: "Apply namespace matches folde preferences" #60213
  • Implement interface fixer doesn't implement conversion operators #60212
  • IDE0072 Populate switch false positive and code switch generates invalid code #60201
  • pm #60195
  • LookupSymbols fails for type parameter in nameof in certain positions #60194
    Backlog

Closed

  • [LSP] Use stack instead of recursion in semantic tokens differ #57433
    17.2
  • Top-level reference to type Program sometimes fails with The type or namespace name 'Program' could not be found #60209
  • [LSP] Unify Razor/Roslyn LCS implementations #57245
    17.2
  • 'Convert typeof to nameof' is not offered on types nested in generic types #47129
    Backlog
  • AnalyzeDataFlow fails #59738
    17.2
  • ControlFlowGraph for VB.NET declaration should generate implicit assignment #60056
    Backlog
  • Compiler crash #60175
  • Add `-testUsedAssemblies` checks to a CI leg #60086
    Compiler.Next
  • CompilationWithAnalyzers.GetAllDiagnosticsAsync() does not respect CompilationWithAnalyzersOptions.ReportSuppressedDiagnostics #41584
    Backlog
  • NullReferenceException in AbstractFlowPass evaluating local function with switch statement in EE #59093
    17.2
  • F1 service redirects to latest visited F1 keyword when none is available #51878
    Backlog
  • F1 service redirects to binary operator for `>` in type argument list (generic method invocation) #60154
    17.2

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix typo in OmniSharp ExternalAccess #60217
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Move more package initialization to BG. #60211
    Area-IDE
  • AbstractFlowPass.VisitStackAllocArrayCreation should use the regular way for visiting initializer #60210
    Area-Compilers
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #60207
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Switch color loading to be async. #60205
    Area-IDE
  • Inline hints: Double click to insert hint can overwrite buffer of previous inserted hint if done too quickly #60204
    Area-IDE
  • Remove enableRoslynAnalyzers from codespace default settings #60203
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Fix conversion issues in null coalescing operator #60202
    Area-Compilers
  • Fix nullability crash in deconstruction of type parameter #60200
    Area-Compilers
  • Test revert #60199
    Area-IDE
  • Try to provide fine-grained text changes in await-completion to help out other hosts. #60197
    Area-IDE
  • Normalize values for `ROSLYN_TEST_*` in `TestRunner` #60196
    Area-Compilers

Merged

  • Merge main-vs-deps to release/dev17.3 #60208
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • use 4.2 version of the compiler to build #60065
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Add SymbolMatcher tests for checked user-defined operators. #60193
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - CheckedUserDefinedOperators
  • Analyze flow in receiver of extension method group in delegate creation #60093
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #60044
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Fixed "Convert typeof to nameof" for types, nested in generic types #60182
    Area-IDE, Community, Next
  • Add auto-default feature status #60198
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Update Roslyn.Diagnostics.Analyzers to 3.3.4-beta1.22160.2 #60118
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Allow creating doc comments around existing comments #59763
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Respect ReportSuppressedDiagnostics option for DiagnosticSuppressor #53045
    Area-Analyzers, Area-Compilers, Community, Next
  • Validate with `-testUsedAssemblies` in a CI leg #60052
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Handle more cases in F1 help service #60156
    Area-IDE, Community, Next
  • Add SyntacticClassifier and SemanticQuickInfo tests for checked user-defined operators. #60191
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - CheckedUserDefinedOperators
  • Ensure declaring compilation can be located for source symbols created during compilation for EE evaluation. #60152
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Add syntax normalizer tests for checked user-defined operators. #60190
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - CheckedUserDefinedOperators

Updated

  • Workspace config options #59790
    Area-IDE
  • Enable .Net Core OOP by default #60163
    Area-IDE
  • Error when required members are not set #60101
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Required Members
  • Use frozen partial semantics for syntax classification #60122
    Area-IDE
  • Implicit field initialization in struct constructors #59788
    Area-Compilers
  • Main attributes for simple programs #59471
    Area-Compilers
  • Merge release/dev17.1 to release/dev17.2 #60188
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Option to always use default symbol servers for GTD #60053
    Area-IDE
  • Adjust CheckedKeywordRecommender for checked user-defined operators. #60183
    Area-IDE, New Feature - CheckedUserDefinedOperators
  • EditorFeatures.Cocoa: Build with net6.0 #59429
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Initialize default capabilities before switching to the UI thread #60106
    Area-IDE
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 327: Build ID 1662698 #60168
    auto-merge
  • Fixed simple signature help bugs #59969
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Initial implementation of a new 'lightweight' background-work-indicator that we can use in-situ in the editor. #59759
    Area-IDE
  • Move Dartlab tests to VS-Platform #60075
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Always try to use cached data for import completion even if outdated #59760
    Area-IDE
  • Add FixAll in containing type/member support for code fixes #59989
    Area-IDE, 17.3
  • Inline Hints: More logic around handling named arguments #60184
    Area-IDE, New Feature - Inline Parameter Hints
  • Support declaring and binding to methods with `params Span<T>` #59123
    Area-Compilers
  • Formatting and code generation options #60127
    Area-IDE
  • Simplifier options #60174
    Area-IDE
  • Extend scope within nameof in attribute on method #40525
    Area-Compilers, PR For Personal Review Only, 17.1
  • Fix type parameter scoping for local functions #60098
    Area-Compilers
  • Support smart escaping of text when pasting into string expressions. #60036
    Area-IDE
  • Safely create VirtualCharSequence from string in StackFrameParser #59283
    Area-IDE

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-03-16
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Show bytes for HTTP/1.1 parsing failures #40745
  • Microsoft.JSInterop.JSException: Could not find 'blazorExtensions.WriteCookie' ('blazorExtensions' was undefined). #40744
  • Automated InvokeVoidAsync on loaded Blazor component to refresh javascript init #40743
  • Blazor - Ambiguous/Duplicate routes for _Host when updating Razor.RuntimeCompilation package to v6.0.3 #40742
  • Consider transpiling Microsoft.JSInterop to ES2018 #40741
    Backlog
  • dotnet-watch flaky test Run_WithHotReloadEnabled_ReadsLaunchSettings #40740
  • How to change Blazor Wasm stand-alone to hosted #40739
  • Adding feature to Router for custom language URL #40736

Closed

  • Support `WithApiDescription` extension method for minimal APIs #40084
    7.0-preview3
  • IIS does not recover from a broken web.config in v6 hosting bundle where it used to in v3 and v5 #40194
  • Horizontal tabs should be allowed in header values #40599
  • Fix WindowsHostingBundle #40703
    7.0-preview3
  • Size regression in Blazor WASM apps #40521
    7.0-preview3
  • Unable to add test-specific Middleware when writing integration tests with WebApplicationFactory<T>: InvalidOperationException: Unable to build IHost #40361
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Add support for filter factory to minimal APIs #40513
    7.0-preview3

PullRequests

Created

  • Avoiding `ParameterBindingMethodCache` exceptions in MVC #40738
    area-mvc
  • Stop using optional catch binding in JSInterop #40737
    area-blazor
  • Support falling back to ConnectionId when RawConnectionId is 0 on HTTP.sys #40733
    area-runtime, community-contribution

Merged

  • Update recovery code generation #40723
    area-identity, 7.0-preview3
  • Fix the missing arm64 sharedfx msi #40717
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview3
  • Add support for route handler filter factories #40667
    area-web-frameworks, 7.0-preview3

Updated

  • Include arm64 payloads for hosting bundle #40709
    area-infrastructure
  • Get richnav.yml building again #40729
    area-infrastructure
  • [Do not merge] Publish some installer artifacts for testing #40647
    area-infrastructure
  • Switch to dynamic cert gen for tests #39685
    area-security
  • Cleanup logs after successful test runs #40411
    area-infrastructure
  • Blazor Prevent Stale Connection Usage Upon Reconnect #40702
    area-blazor
  • Regenerate compiled DeveloperExceptionPage views #40711
    area-runtime
  • Make IResults types public #40704
    area-web-frameworks
  • Adding a new ActionResult to process IResult #40710
    area-mvc

entry.title: dotnet/diagnostics - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-03-16

Issues

Updated

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-03-16
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • SearchBar crashes on Windows #5359
  • TimePicker only shows time when mouse hovers on Windows #5358
  • ScrollView VerticalScrollBarVisibility setting stays default #5357
  • Workloads fail to update after installing 2022 17.2 Preview 2 #5356
  • MAUI Templates missing in VS 2022 17.2 Preview 2 #5355
  • VS2022 Version 17.2.0 Preview 2.0 Unable to pair to Mac #5354
  • Essentials Email ComposeAsync Fails on WinUI with Attachment #5353
  • [WinUI] DoPropertyChanged on a bound FormattedString property throws IMauiContext not found #5350
  • Problems with Button and ImageButton #5347
  • [MacCatalyst] SearchBar in HorizontalStackLayout Crashes on App on Startup #5346
  • bad grid layout in a stack #5344
  • bad grid layout #5343
  • Compiled bindings don't support MultiBindings #5342
  • Docs don't show up in Intellisense for .NET MAUI types #5341
  • Add new VisualDiagnostic APIs for rendering elements and views as images. #5340
  • [Android] Application crashed while load more images on scroll view #5339
  • NullReferenceException in CreateNativeHandler for HttpClient on IOS #5337
  • Microsoft.Maui.Dispatching.IDispatcherTimer frequently fires too early #5335
  • IWindow.VisualDiagnosticsOverlay.Density is always 1 #5334
  • CollectionView with Header or Footer throws: The specified child already has a parent. You must call removeView() on the child's parent first #5332
  • Project with SkiaSharp nugets is not built for iOS (error MSB6006: "ditto" exited with code 1) #5329
  • EXE files cannot be double-clicked to run #5327
  • SearchBar Text changed Event is not triggered in iOS and MacCatalyst Platform #5326

Closed

  • HttpClient warning in Microsoft.MacCatalyst #5325
  • Run MAUI project on Physical Device (iPhone-Mac) #5349
  • [Android] HeightRequest, WidthRequest, MinimumWidthRequest and MinimumHeightRequest are not respected by Contentview #4164
  • [Bug] .NET MAUI projects do not build on Apple M1 #1681
  • [Bug] App crashing after returning from SSO Auth #1801
  • [Windows]Clip property is not working properly in preview 12 #4250
  • Security in MAUI we need the basic tampering checks #4943
  • Entry ReturnType Prop #5321
  • [WinUI] Border disappears when content placed inside. #3791
  • [Bug] Borders in UWP does not render #3113
  • Border background color is not updated in Windows machine #4248
  • Border doesn't render background first run #5061

PullRequests

Created

  • [MacCatalyst] Only respond to selectors that we exported in this class #5361
    platform/macOS 🍏, area/single project ☝️, 6.0.300-rc.1
  • Add additional VisualDiagnostic Image APIs #5360
  • [LOC_HB] checkin of localized string files #5352
  • Lazy-load Configuration #5348
  • [Windows] Implement FlyoutHeaderBehavior property #5345
    platform/windows 🪟, area/shell 🐢
  • [X] Compile FontSizeConverter #5338
    area/Xaml </>, area/perf 🏎️
  • Setup WinUI for single project in a props file #5333

Merged

  • LEGO: Pull request from lego/hb_7241b85a-f216-4d55-a9fa-d8030c736df5_20220316203836090 to loc #5351
  • Enforce Width/Height for ContentView on Android #5314
  • Update AOT Profile using the latest builds #5319
  • Add IWindow.DisplayDensity #5185
    t/enhancement ☀️, p/1, area/desktop 🖥️, Cost:M, Status:InProgress, Future
  • [Windows] Fixes related with Clipping #5224
    platform/windows 🪟, area/drawing ✏️
  • Make Border render itself on Windows. #5324
  • Item Template cleanup #5311
    area/templates 📄

Updated

  • Adds Tizen backend #2360
    area/setup 🪄, Future
  • Remove SetupDefaults #5317
  • [dualscreen] project/nuget for Surface Duo and other Android foldables #5020
    area/controls 🎮, control-dualscreen
  • Improve Glide usage for Image Loading on Android #5198
  • RTL FlowDirection fix for Windows #5205
    area/layout 🔲
  • [Core] Implement BackgroundImageSource in PageHandler #3396
    area/controls 🎮, control-pages, 6.0.300-rc.1
  • Fix some crashing tests & localization #5261
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • Mark all the Device [Obsolete] #5088
    area/migration 🚚, 6.0.300-rc.1
  • [WIP] Rework use of ObtainStyledAttributes so we can enable `AndroidLinkResources` #4912
  • Updated HotReload, so it now listens to the MetadataUpdateHandler #5318
    area/tooling ⚙️

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-03-16
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Allow templates to be placed anywhere instead of CodeTemplates from the scaffolder. #27656
  • Diagnostics: DataReaderDisposingEventData.ReadCount accumulates the value from different readers in EF Core 6.0.3 #27652
  • Migrations needlessly rename indexes (SQL Server) #27651
  • Refactor BuiltInDataTypes #27650
  • Migration from old Entity Framework, one complex request not execute properly #27649
  • prevent creating foreign key by convention or navigation property #27648

Closed

  • Concurrency detection/exceptions and delete #27562
  • Allow to Disable All Automatic Relationships #27647
  • Proper way to seed test data in EF Core 6.0.2 #27599
  • Point Read with EF Core and cosmosdb #27653

PullRequests

Created

  • Revert "feat (codespaces) - Add initial support for codespaces (#27483)" #27655
  • Ensure FK properties have nullable-appropriate value comparers #27654

Updated

  • Improve SQL Server insertion logic and other update pipeline optimizations #27573
    auto-merge
  • Support SQL Server UTF8 strings #27634

entry.title: dotnet/installer - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-03-16
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • Installing with Homebrew with Defender installed fails #13421
  • Consider migrating the src/redist/targets path to an arcade sdk for sdk based installers. #13411

PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.3xx' => 'main' #13435
  • Add leak detection #13434
  • Refactor SdkContentTests to warn on diffs when run in CI #13432

Merged

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.2xx' => 'release/6.0.3xx' #13427
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.3xx' => 'main' #13428
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.1xx' => 'release/6.0.2xx' #13399

Updated

  • [release/6.0.1xx] Add the Red Hat test suite as a smoke test for source-build #13418
